title: Berlin Power Outage Hits 50,000 Homes in Suspected Arson Attack
description: Some 50,000 households and 2,000 businesses in southwest Berlin were without power on Saturday afternoon after a suspected arson attack in the early hours of the morning, police said.
content: Some 50,000 households and 2,000 businesses in southwest Berlin were without power on Saturday afternoon after a suspected arson attack in the early hours of the morning, police said.
